    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-subeditoria' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999999px}</style><div </script>

                                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/sp/vale-do-paraiba-regiao/" class="menu-item-link item-afiliada" title="vale do paraíba e região"><span class="menu-item-title">
                                                        vale do paraíba e região
                                                    </span></a></li></ul></li></ul><span class="back">voltar</span></div><div class="regiao regiao-sul"><p class="menu-submenu-title menu-item-back">
                    Sul
                </p><ul class="menu-root menu-level mosaic-states-list"><li class="menu-item is-father"><a href="/pr/parana/" class="menu-item-link state parana" title="paraná" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-parana"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-parana">
                                        paraná
                                    </span></a><ul class="menu-level menu-submenu menu-submenu-level1 menu-submenu-column-1" id="list-subregions-parana"><p class="menu-submenu-title menu-item-back menu-subregion-back">
                                            paraná
                                        </p><li class="menu-item"><a href="/pr/parana/" class="menu-item-link item-afiliada" title="curitiba e região"><span class="menu-item-title">
                                                        curitiba e região

                                                        campos gerais e sul

                                                        norte e noroeste
                                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/pr/oeste-sudoeste/" class="menu-item-link item-afiliada" title="oeste e sudoeste"><span class="menu-item-title">
                                                        oeste e sudoeste
                                                    </span></a></li></ul></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/rs/rio-grande-do-sul/" class="menu-item-link state rio-grande-do-sul" title="rio grande do sul" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-rio-grande-do-sul"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-rio-grande-do-sul">

                                        santa catarina

d=null!=t.expire&&t.expire>=0?t.expire:60,a=t.success||function(){},c=t.error||function(){},i=t.key||n,v=t.type,h=t.skipCache,b=t.timeout||null,p=null,y=t.xhrConfigsCallback,l=t.data,u=null!=t.dataType?t.dataType:v,null==v&&(v=n.split("."),v=v[v.length-1]),g="json"===v,w="json"===u,(o=this.getCache(i,h,g))?void a(o):(m=s(e,n))?(y&&"function"==typeof y&&y(m),f="undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest&&m instanceof XDomainRequest,m.onload||(m.onload=function(e){return function(){var n;return p&&clearTimeout(p),n=f||m.status>=200&&m.status<400,n?(o=m.responseText,g&&(o=JSON.parse(o)),e.complete(o,d,i,h,g,a)):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return Prefeitura decretou estado na quinta-feira (23) após risco de nova enchente.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="4"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/mg/zona-da-mata/noticia/2017/03/chuva-de-granizo-assusta-moradores-de-uba.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/AlbkKTgzzBPCvypeRl3_ZqP_McU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/uba.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/lQdLEV6R6XlLTTSLxxgXwmtrvmU=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/uba.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/1q3WC27wU1PLSgOFW41GMLlr2yM=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/uba.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/AlbkKTgzzBPCvypeRl3_ZqP_McU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/uba.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Zona da Mata</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/mg/zona-da-mata/noticia/2017/03/chuva-de-granizo-assusta-moradores-de-uba.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Chuva de granizo assusta moradores de Ubá</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Bombeiros foram acionados para atender ocorrências de queda de árvores.
Chuva na tarde deste sábado (25) durou cerca de 30 minutos.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="5"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/am/amazonas/noticia/2017/03/exercito-do-am-apreende-117-kg-de-maconha-na-fronteira-com-colombia.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/UfeHPPniJloSgW7wAInjv590t4k=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/17521932_1234055916710082_809402914_o.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/_EylnBYrqp9U7bUBDtzugOC9Mqg=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/17521932_1234055916710082_809402914_o.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/YLKbv6DGKgwvNlBsGQjyNeARoQw=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/17521932_1234055916710082_809402914_o.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/UfeHPPniJloSgW7wAInjv590t4k=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/17521932_1234055916710082_809402914_o.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Amazonas</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/am/amazonas/noticia/2017/03/exercito-do-am-apreende-117-kg-de-maconha-na-fronteira-com-colombia.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Exército apreende 117 kg de drogas em região de fronteira no AM</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Apreensão ocorreu no Rio Japurá, próximo ao município de Tabatinga.
Homens que faziam transporte do entorpecente fugiram.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="6"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ap/amapa/noticia/2017/03/abraco-inspira-recital-de-tres-anos-do-grupo-poetas-azuis-em-macapa.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/aD2mKV4e55kCmCVTok2HyfkX2-o=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/09/19/11802650_554751104663676_4685338777567590903_o.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/HTtPjfN3ej5n0XOk0zb2zSu35VA=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/09/19/11802650_554751104663676_4685338777567590903_o.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/BBDXrFtU3dFmp9R0mmwPito5MgU=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/09/19/11802650_554751104663676_4685338777567590903_o.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/aD2mKV4e55kCmCVTok2HyfkX2-o=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2015/09/19/11802650_554751104663676_4685338777567590903_o.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Amapá</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ap/amapa/noticia/2017/03/abraco-inspira-recital-de-tres-anos-do-grupo-poetas-azuis-em-macapa.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Abraço inspira recital de três anos do grupo Poetas Azuis, em Macapá</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Grupo comemora trajetória na música e poesia amapaense.
Evento vai ocorrer no dia 1º de abril, na Zona Leste da capital.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Centro-Oeste</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/mg/centro-oeste/noticia/2017/03/homem-e-morto-tiros-dentro-de-condominio-em-nova-serrana.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Homem é morto a tiros dentro de condomínio em Nova Serrana</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Testemunhas disseram a policiais que escutaram disparos e viram autor.
Crime ocorreu na tarde deste sábado (25).</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/am/amazonas/noticia/2017/03/homem-e-assassinado-golpes-de-machado-na-zona-leste-de-manaus.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/zT0PUrzWzR2EIYWLDagFOtSZ8Wc=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/09/19/delegacia.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/iRFSZ8i_Lx1os0aLHv3fJibfiD4=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/09/19/delegacia.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/E41cLKwbBE719NJHZ4stCet-DPg=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/09/19/delegacia.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/zT0PUrzWzR2EIYWLDagFOtSZ8Wc=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/09/19/delegacia.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Amazonas</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/am/amazonas/noticia/2017/03/homem-e-assassinado-golpes-de-machado-na-zona-leste-de-manaus.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Homem é assassinado a golpes de machado na Zona Leste de Manaus</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Segundo a polícia, morte tem relação com tráfico de drogas.
Corpo foi encontrado em matagal na Comunidade João Paulo.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ro/rondonia/noticia/2017/03/exposicao-cultural-reune-poemas-e-artes-de-500-alunos-em-porto-velho.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/jgBT23bLp1h2lZoXTR_XKTvb84s=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/dsc_0007.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/Uv73cXMel-QyPw1HNOQoXO_ACCM=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/dsc_0007.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/XrYbyrOdpjj8--_cAZaVjRIJc8Q=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/dsc_0007.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/jgBT23bLp1h2lZoXTR_XKTvb84s=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/25/dsc_0007.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Rondônia</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ro/rondonia/noticia/2017/03/exposicao-cultural-reune-poemas-e-artes-de-500-alunos-em-porto-velho.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Exposição cultural reúne poemas e artes de 500 alunos em Porto Velho</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Trabalhos foram desenvolvidos em sala de aula de escola. 
Mostra reúne trabalhos feitos por crianças de 1 a 13 anos.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ap/amapa/noticia/2017/03/amapa-descarta-risco-de-epidemia-de-casos-de-febre-amarela-diz-cvs.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/EvMYSrgNWRwBx8N9C35NwtKFBFU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/vacinacao_noite_vv21_03.jpeg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/kGPCcpj2R8g3UUrG0AM1bVR2pgE=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/vacinacao_noite_vv21_03.jpeg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/ZMzXyJm0deh-Ij5XyMfg7Qsllss=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/vacinacao_noite_vv21_03.jpeg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/EvMYSrgNWRwBx8N9C35NwtKFBFU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/21/vacinacao_noite_vv21_03.jpeg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Amapá</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 8 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ap/amapa/noticia/2017/03/amapa-descarta-risco-de-epidemia-de-casos-de-febre-amarela-diz-cvs.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Amapá descarta risco de epidemia de casos de febre amarela, diz CVS</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Estado não registra casos da doença há mais de dez anos.
Prevenção da febre ocorre através de vacinação e controle de mosquito. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if($ && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-36d846f4-9eea-405a-a6d8-78624ac62b64');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-subeditoria' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1025], ['tablet', 641], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999999px}</style><div t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>

</div><div id="glb-corpo"><div class="glb-conteudo"><div class="opec-position-top3"><div id="banner_slb_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="glb-bloco"><div class="glb-grid-12"></div></div><div class="glb-bloco"><div class="glb-grid-5"><div class="destaque destaque-principal principal-foto-meio hentry"><div class="chamada chamada-principal "><strong class="titulo entry-title"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/economia/imposto-de-renda/noticia/2015/05/perdeu-o-prazo-de-declaracao-do-imposto-de-renda-saiba-o-que-fazer.html" rel="bookmark">

        Perdeu o prazo para declarar o Imposto de Renda? Saiba o que fazer

            </a></strong><p class="subtitulo entry-summary">Multa mínima é de R$ 165,74, mas pode atingir 20% do imposto devido.</p></div></div><!-- ultimas noticias --><div class="widget economy-widget widget-noticias-semantico economy-widget-borderless economy-widget-loading"><div class="status-overlay"><div class="error_message">Ocorreu uma falha de comunicação com a fonte de dados. <a class="reload">Recarregar</a></div></div><script class="template-noticia" type="text/html" charset="utf-8"><li class="item-noticia-plantao destaque"><div class="hora">{:ultima_publicacao}</div><div class="item-chamada">

                        {:thumbnail}

                        <p class="titulo"><a title="{:titulo}" href="{:permalink}">{:titulo}</a></p><p class="subtitulo">{:subtitulo}</p></div></li></script><script class="template-imagem-noticia" type="text/html" charset="utf-8"><div class="foto esquerda l80 ajuste-margem a60"><span class="canto-ce"></span><span class="canto-cd"></span><span class="canto-re"></span><span class="canto-rd"></span><a href="{:permalink}" title="{:titulo}" class="borda-interna"><img width="80" height="60" src="{:thumbnail}" alt="{:titulo}" title="{:titulo}" /></a></div></script><div class="corpo-noticias"><div class="publicidade" id="noticias-semantico-banner"><div id="banner_midbanner" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="lista-noticias"><div class="titulo-widget"><p><a href="noticia/plantao.html"><span>últimas notícias</span><span class="seta"></span></a></p></div><ul class="lista-data-plantao "><li class="item-data-plantao"><div class="linha"></div><p class="data"><span></span></p><ul class="lista-noticia-plantao"></ul></li></ul></div></div><div class="widget-rodape"><a title="busque mais notícias" href="noticia/plantao.html">

    // <![CDATA[
        $(function(){

                url = '/shopping/g1.xml';

            $('#produtos-conteudo-29875466').shopping(url,5,function(status){

                if(status=='error') {
                    $(".widget-shopping .shopping-navegacao").hide();
                    $(".widget-shopping .shopping-produtos").hide();
                } else {
                    $(this).cycle({
                        fx:     'scrollHorz',
                        speed:  'fast',
                        timeout: 5000,
                        pause: 1,
                        next:   '#widget_shopping_29875466 .prox',
                        prev:   '#widget_shopping_29875466 .ant',
                        height: '120px',
                        pager: '#nav_29875466',
                        pagerAnchorBuilder: function(index, element){
                            $('#nav_29875466').append('<a href="#" id="shopping_pagina_' + index + '" class="navegacao-pagina link-navegacao-29875466"><span>' + index + '</span></a>');
                        }
                    });
                }
            });

            $('.link-navegacao-29875466').click(function(){
              index = parseInt($(this).attr('id').replace('shopping_pagina_',''));
              $('#produtos-conteudo-29875466').cycle(index);
              return false;
            });

            $('#widget_shopping_29875466 .prox, #widget_shopping_29875466 .ant').click(function(){
                  //hack para ie7 e ie6 suportarem o active
                  $(this).blur();
                  return false;
            });

        });

    color: #fff !important;
}
</style><script type="text/javascript" src="http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/static/live/COMPR/js/5c/dfd69bd6e65c.js"></script><script src="http://s.videos.globo.com/p2/j/api.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script src="http://s.glbimg.com/bu/j/jquery.buscaPadrao-v2.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {
            if (typeof glb !== 'undefined') {
                var midiasEmbed = glb.midiasEmbeded;
                if (midiasEmbed){
                    for (midia in midiasEmbed){
                        midiasEmbed[midia].videoURL = midiasEmbed[midia].videoURL;
                        new WM.Player(midiasEmbed[midia]).attachTo($('#' + midia)[0]);
                    }
                }
            }
        });
    </script><script type="text/javascript">
            glb.Refresher.getInstance({"timeout":300});

            $("#busca-padrao").buscaPadrao({
                "url": "http://g1.globo.com/busca/",
                "produto":"g1",
                "suggest_ligado":true,

                'site': "G1",
                'section': ""
            });
